alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 3:52AM CDT until June 26 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Southwestern Henry County in southeastern Alabama... Southeastern Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... Eastern Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Northwestern Houston County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 445 AM CDT. * At 352 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Daleville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Daleville, Dothan, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Headland, Ozark, Hartford, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Level Plains, Slocomb, Newton, Webb, New Brockton, Pinckard, Malvern, Rehobeth, Clayhatchee and Grimes. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
